actions.text: On agreeing to the Hunter amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 255 (Roll no. 600).

Roll call votes on amendments in House

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment sought to establish a program acknowledging contributions of third parties to a State DOT's roadside maintenance through a corporate logo made of live plant materials rather than conventional metallic material.
purpose: An amendment No. 7 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to establish a program to permit the use of live plant materials for road side maintenance.
